resources.string: During this task, letters will appear on the screen one at a time. Quickly tap the screen when you see any letter EXCEPT the letter X. Try as hard as you can not to tap the screen when you see the letter X. Try to respond as quickly as possible without error.
Hold the device in the palm of your hand or set it on a flat service and hold it in place. With your other hand, hold one finger above the screen making sure not to cover the letter.
